title: Bug 120315 - Display property of item not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: The display property of an item set to 'none' does not take effect in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Add a label. 
2. Open the 'properties' view. 
3. Set 'display' property of the label to 'none'. 
4. Verify that the label is still visible in the PDF emitted.
